page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: It is quite easy to get a job because there is a Job Centre in Bovey Tracey. However there are not enough jobs to go around. One boy in our class said his Dad does not have a job so he's not very rich. Most people in Bovey Tracey have a job,working in shops cafe's, health centres, factories and other thing's like that. I think most people like their job's. Some people go to Exeter, Newton Abbot, Torquay and even Plymouth to work. Hawkmoor Hospital, Bovey Tracey Hospital, farms, and local businesses all provide employment.
